snippet: Private institutions have sprung up around the country to teach Korean pop music, and long-established music and dance schools have begun to get with the pop plan.
abstract: Many private institutions are springing up around South Korea to teach children and teenagers how to become Korean pop music entertainers; long-established music and dance schools have begun to change their curriculum as well to respond to growing demand.
lead_paragraph: Private institutions have sprung up around the country to teach Korean pop music, and long-established music and dance schools have begun to get with the pop plan.

headline.main: Cramming for Stardom at Korea’s K-Pop Schools
headline.print_headline: Cramming for Stardom at K-Pop School
